{{also|abfahrt|abfährt}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|ab|Fahrt|t1=from|t2=run, drive, ride, journey, trip}}, compare {{m|de|abfahren||to depart, to leave}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|de|De-Abfahrt.ogg|audio}} * {{IPA|de|[ˈapfaːɐt]}} * {{hyphenation|de|Ab|fahrt}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f}} # [[departure]] #: ''[[fünf|Fünf]] [[Minute]]n [[vor]] '''Abfahrt''' [[des]] [[Zug]]es.'' #:: Five minutes before train departure. # {{lb|de|sports}} [[downhill]] # [[slip road]] ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|departure}} {{l|de|Abreise}}, ([[Abflug]]) * {{sense|slip road}} {{l|de|Ausfahrt}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
